description: Sumiya Kana is http://anidb.net/ch13157 [Sora]`s classmate and http://anidb.net/ch13159 [Nami]`s best friend. Kana and Nami are the only members of the cosplay club. She makes female outfits for Sora and Nami forces these outfits unto her brother. She has feelings for Sora but is too shy to confess them. She is unaware of Nami`s feelings towards her. Even when Nami stated she loved her, Kana believed it meant because they were friends. After a date, at which Kana gave Sora a kiss and a boob-job, Nami, who was witnessing from a cupboard, snapped, leading to her raping Sora.
name: Sumiya Kana
